text: Bud' uveren, o poslannik, kotoromu porucheno peredat' Poslaniye, v tom, chto Allakhu Yedinomu prinadlezhit vso v nebesakh i na zemle! On nakazyvayet, kogo zakhochet, Svoyey moshch'yu i mudrost'yu i proshchayet, komu pozhelayet, Svoyey mudrost'yu i milost'yu. Allakh Vsemogushch, vlasten i moshchen nad kazhdoy veshch'yu
